name: SRD-476D  (4ch)
description: 4CH 1280H (950TVL) real-time DVR - Up to 120(N) / 100(P)fps recording rate
Easy user interface, common across all Samsung DVRs - GUI / Search / Back up / Set-up
Set independently for each channel - REC / Quality / Resolution
Privacy mask support for each channel (4ea)
Convenient with strong network monitoring - CMS (SSM, SmartViewer, Net-I), Web viewer, Smart phones (iPOLiS mobile)
Accurate still image (De-Interlace support each channel)
VGA / HDMI for Full-HD (1080p) resolution video out
Video spot (Analog 1ea, Digital 1ea), USB (2ports) back up
Up to 4CH audio inputs / 1CH audio output

members.name: Video Input
members.details: 4 Composite video 0.5-1 Vpp, 75 ohm automatic termination

members.name: BNC Output
members.details: 2CH (Digital spot 1CH / Analog spot 1CH) *Included OSD on screen, Multi mode support

members.name: Record Rate
members.details:
NTSC : Up to 120fps@1280 x 480 / PAL : Up to 100fps@1280 x 576 *Play back 60/50fps
NTSC : Up to 120fps@704 x 480 / PAL : Up to 100fps@704 x 576
NTSC : Up to 120fps@704 x 240 / PAL : Up to 100fps@704 x 288
NTSC : Up to 120fps@352 x 240 / PAL : Up to 100fps@352 x 288

members.name: Function
members.details:
Fast forward / backward (2x, 4x, 8x, 16x, 32x, 64x) *Backward play with i-frame only
Slow forward / backward (1/2x, 1/4x, 1/8x)
Step forward / backward *Backward play with i-frame only

members.name: Serial Interface
members.details: RS-232/RS-485 (Half duplex) for PTZ, Samsung system keyboard
